'''Adhigama Vine-Backed Chair''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Adhigama Vine-Backed Chair is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.
